languages.text: "Пусть ищущие да обретут Знание. А ненавистники их во скверне пожнут лишь горе".
"Let those who seek Knowledge find it. And let their enemies reap naught in corruption but woe."
languages.original_text: "Пусть ищущие да обретут Знание. А ненавистники их во скверне пожнут лишь горе".

traits.locale_text: "Let those who seek Knowledge find it. And let their enemies reap naught in corruption but woe."
"Let those who seek Knowledge find it. And let their enemies reap naught in corruption but woe."
"Let those who seek Knowledge find it. And let their enemies reap naught in corruption but woe."
"Let those who seek Knowledge find it. And let their enemies reap naught in corruption but woe."

languages.text: “愿那些寻求知识的人得到知识，愿他们的敌人在腐化中步向灭亡。”
languages.original_text: "Let those who seek Knowledge find it. And let their enemies reap naught in corruption but woe."

traits.locale_text: “愿那些寻求知识的人得到知识，愿他们的敌人在腐化中步向灭亡。”

languages.text: 「知識を求める者には、それを探させよ。その敵には悲しみだけでなく腐敗も刈り取らせよ」
languages.original_text: "Let those who seek Knowledge find it. And let their enemies reap naught in corruption but woe."

traits.locale_text: 「知識を求める者には、それを探させよ。その敵には悲しみだけでなく腐敗も刈り取らせよ」

languages.text: "Wer Wissen sucht, möge es finden. Und seine Feinde mögen in der Verderbnis nur Leid ernten."
languages.original_text: "Let those who seek Knowledge find it. And let their enemies reap naught in corruption but woe."

traits.locale_text: "Wer Wissen sucht, möge es finden. Und seine Feinde mögen in der Verderbnis nur Leid ernten."

languages.text: « Puisse la connaissance trouver ceux qui la cherchent. Et que ses ennemis ne tirent que du malheur de la corruption. »
languages.original_text: "Let those who seek Knowledge find it. And let their enemies reap naught in corruption but woe."

traits.locale_text: « Puisse la connaissance trouver ceux qui la cherchent. Et que ses ennemis ne tirent que du malheur de la corruption. »

languages.text: «Dejad que aquellos que buscan el conocimiento lo encuentren. Dejad que sus enemigos no reciban de la corrupción más que el infortunio».
languages.original_text: "Let those who seek Knowledge find it. And let their enemies reap naught in corruption but woe."

traits.locale_text: «Dejad que aquellos que buscan el conocimiento lo encuentren. Dejad que sus enemigos no reciban de la corrupción más que el infortunio».

languages.text: "İrfanı arayanlar onu bulsun. Düşmanlarıysa cehaletin altında kederle boğulsun."
languages.original_text: "Let those who seek Knowledge find it. And let their enemies reap naught in corruption but woe."

traits.locale_text: "İrfanı arayanlar onu bulsun. Düşmanlarıysa cehaletin altında kederle boğulsun."
